Fedora Tricks

  1. Create an LVM partition on a disk
    1. Get to parted
      sudo parted /dev/sda
    2. Create the partition
      mkpart primary ext2 282625 282624
    3. Print to list the partitions
      print                                                            
Model: ATA ST31000528AS (scsi)
Disk /dev/sda: 1000GB
Sector size (logical/physical): 512B/512B
Partition Table: msdos
Disk Flags: 

Number  Start   End     Size    Type     File system  Flags
 1      1049kB  1075MB  1074MB  primary  ext4         boot
 2      1075MB  276GB   275GB   primary               lvm
 3      283GB   565GB   283GB   primary
    4. Label it for LVM
      set 3 lvm on
